comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Like several of the other pictures of British admirals and generals in this batch, this picture was used on a cover of Navy & Army Illustrated. See cgi.ebay.com/Photo-General-Sir-H-S-Jones-Royal-Marines-UK...

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: swang:  Thanks for the link to the issue of Navy & Army Illustrated which helps date the original photograph. We will add some of the information to the record description when we update.
